website_summaries.verdict: Hybrid snip-and-clip nail trimmer that users rate as safe and effective.
pros: Customers like the "spy hole" to see what you're doing and unique design that makes clipping baby's nails safer and easier
Stands out for not leaving jagged edges
cons: you might want to practice on your own nails first

customer_reviews.title: Herculean Clippers
customer_reviews.text: These are waay too husky for a baby's tiny little nails. I tested them out on myself first and they didn't snip but crushed my nails. The scissor-like design is fine for clipping rabbit or other creature's nails, but not for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fridababy succeeds again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these clippers!!!!! Fridababy has done it again with this awesome product! I was able to quickly clip my 11 MO's nails without tears (from either of us). The spy hole helps so much better than magnifying glasses on other clippers. I used it in sunlight and I was able to see his little nails through the hole perfectly. Another great feature is that there isn't a "clip" noise!
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Woman

customer_reviews.title: Window makes a big difference!
customer_reviews.text: Like most first-time parents, clipping my LO's nails can be nerve racking, but after a few careful tries, I have to say the window really helps a lot! What I do is look in the window and position my LO's nail (palm face down) into the clipper section. I then position the nail onto the bottom clipper so that the finger is flushed against the outside bottom part and only the nail is within the clipper part. That way I know I won't cut any flesh. It also helps when my LO is not moving so I tend to do this when he's asleep. The filer is a good final touch in making the cut smoother.
customer_reviews.author: ahjeck

customer_reviews.title: Multiple safety features
customer_reviews.text: The window feature is phenomenal, but what makes the biggest difference for me is the shear-like clipping surface. Adult clippers sort of "pop" together to snip the entire width of the nail in one go, where these gradually close (think scissor blades) and just take a little at a time, working across the nail. Very gentle and safe. My newborn only objects to me immobilizing their hands to clip nails; I swear they don't event feel the actual clip.
customer_reviews.author: Molly W.

customer_reviews.title: I WISH I HAD KNOWN SOONER!
customer_reviews.text: so after traumatizing my now 3 year old at about the age of 1, it took us a year to get him to let me clip his nails when he was awake... you can guess how he was traumatized. Well, I now have a small infant and practically had the same thing happen when my son bumped into me as I was taking care of his sister... so i said, ENOUGH! I must try something different. All I can say, don't waste your time with anything else. These are absolutely amazing and I would make them as a MUST have on your baby list. JUST. BUY. THEM. ALREADY!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael W.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS! Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I cannot love this product enough! MAMA's - YOU MUST BUY THIS PRODUCT! I recommend this product to all my friends having their first babies and I tell them to put all the Frida products on their registry. But this particular product is just the best. Clipping tiny fingernails and toenails is daunting, this product is essential if you don't want to hurt your baby. Its a genius design and makes this task easy! It has a scissor design so it snips instead of clips, but it has the clipping mechanism which makes it easier to handle and use. BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: A Baby/Toddler/Wiggly Kid MUST
customer_reviews.text: I'm back to reorder immediately after discovering we have misplaced these. It takes a (very) short adjustment period because the scissor-like action is different than what you're used to, but once you get the hang of it you'll never go back. The cutout "window" helps see what you're doing better. It's easy to cut very short but nearly impossible to cut too short (no bleeders.) That all puts these firmly in my own MUST HAVE category, and also now on my short list of things to give to every new parent in my life as something they never new would make their life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Love this nail clipper but it broke after less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I use this nail clippee to cut my baby's nail. It is easy to use and I've never knicked my baby. I've been raving about it to other moms. Well yesterday after clipping my baby's nails the clipper literally fell apart! I don't understand how it broke since I put it back in it's original package after use and it's stored upright. I've had my adult nail Clippers for years but this one lasts less than 4 months. This is a rip off! I'm highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fitivlife

customer_reviews.title: no more accidentally cutting the baby.
customer_reviews.text: Before I got these, I had nipped by baby's nails a couple of times and made them bleed (I cried, he didn't!). I saw these recommended on a random facebook mom's group, and decided to buy them. They act like tiny little scissors/ clipper hybrid. They are solid enough to clip an adult's fingernails (I tried on myself). It is much easier to just get the nail and no skin inside the clipper. The nail file I have not used as my babies wiggle too much to contemplate that.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed, Not Safe for Baby
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked these clippers. I tried them on myself and there was no way to pinch or cut myself so I assumed they were safe for my Baby. After a few uses the clippers got off alignment or something and tried using them on myself again and was able to cut my skin. Definitely not safe for baby and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: A definite must have!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! This product is amazing. finally I can Clip my babies nails without having to worry about hurting her. Frida is amazing we buy all of their baby products lol. This is a must have to make parenting easier 💗💗💗 they work like scissors except with a little window so you can see exactly where they’re going to cut. This prevents you from trying to clip nails without being able to see the skin underneath. The scissor method behind these makes them easier to use and control also so the nail is cut evenly from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I was a bit skeptical at first. I have always used traditional clippers and the first time I clipped my daughters nails with the traditional, accidentally nipped two of them. I've been hesitant to make another attempt, although my wife seemed relatively proficient at it. We purchased these in hopes of having an easier time clipping them and I can honestly say that the experience was worthwhile. The scissor design is meant to push flesh out of the way while catching and clipping the nail. It worked like a charm. We were able to clip all 10 little finger nails while she was eating breakfast. Piece of cake! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bregan

customer_reviews.title: More instructions needed
customer_reviews.text: No instructions with it which I guess is typical for this brand as I’ve bought multiple of their items and none of them have instructions really. Although it doesn’t need much instruction, I was unsure of the best way to hold the clippers to use the peep hole thing and the best way to use the file since it’s curved. The nail file is still not easy for me to use but the clippers I’ve gotten the hang of
customer_reviews.author: Lea B

customer_reviews.title: able to see my princess safe really eases us
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the nail clipper was designed. Able to see the baby's nail through space really helps. I just had the first kid. My wife and I named her Emma. cute tiny hands, cute tiny figures, paper-thin fingernails. While my baby moves her hand freely everywhere... clipping her nails is a very hard task. Emma keeps scratching her face... Leaving the fingernails alone wasn't an option for us. I never thought I will be this scared to clip a nail. Even with this clipper I still have a hard time but Being able to see my baby will be safe before clipping really eases my wife and me.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: These clippers are magic
customer_reviews.text: These are the only clippers to go with. I initially purchased the clippers with a light at the tip but they were NOT easy to use! I cut a whole pizza slice out of my newborn’s finger and exclusively used a nail file for the following 9 months until a mom-friend convinced me to try these bad boys. The window helps you ensure you’re only clipping off parts of your baby that you don’t want anymore. The scissor/clipper combo design also feels easier and safer. Buy these and then buy them for your expectant friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well for soft and short nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn. Based on my experience, this item doesn’t work well for newborns soft nails, may good for long nails, but not if you only like to trim a little bit .
customer_reviews.author: Jay Balin

customer_reviews.title: Not necessary
customer_reviews.text: My son was asleep so he was very still and I still nipped him! I dont blame the snippers just know those little nails are tiny and hard to judge so be careful and if ur nervous just use a file. Now about the file it's a bit too fine, unless my sons fast asleep and I have time to go over and over his nails that file will work.. but I ended up going to the beauty supply and getting a super fine file and it was the best $2 I've ever spent! I've sworn off snippers for now, I'll take being clawed any day
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Turned my daughter’s nails into Edward Scissorhands
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for these clippers. I love the see-through window. However, they make my daughter’s nails extremely sharp. No amount of filing helps. I didn’t need scissors, I needed clippers. I had to return these because my daughter scratched her face horribly after we use these clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Too-Much Information

customer_reviews.title: No more cut fingers!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the one “can’t live without” baby product we’ve come across and we’ve tried a lot of baby gadgets. Cutting fingernails was so stressful for us and the baby - my wife refused to do it anymore! Even with our best efforts and both helping we still got pinched fingers every time. NOT with nail frida! You don’t even have to worry about pinching anymore. You just press them up against the finger and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: ramman

customer_reviews.title: The best nail file!
customer_reviews.text: These work well, but the file is the best part. We had one accident with a pair of cheaper clippers that left us all a little afraid. The file rules for getting his nails down and taking off the sharp edges. The clippers work better with baby nails, but I've noticed they seem to just bend the nail and not cut it, so it takes a few times to get the nail off, its ragged and then you have to file. I wish they sold the file separately so we could buy a cheaper replacement when this one fades.
customer_reviews.author: TheHadleyHome

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to start clipping nails with this giant clippers but once I clipped the first nail then I realized just how easy it was and haven't had any issues or worries since. It's so easy to hook the nail in these and then clip away and it doesn't get any skin (amazingly)! My little guy fidgets quite a bit so I sometimes am not the best at being super careful and we still haven't had any issues. This daunting task has been made into something super easy and effective with these giant baby clippers!
customer_reviews.author: LacyLampe

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Clippers & File for Baby
customer_reviews.text: The BEST clippers, in my opinion. The only thing I would add is a small light or magnifying aspect, but even without those things these are still amazing. They clip in the manner of a clipper but with scissor-like cutting blades. The file is shaped like an S, which I didn’t know I needed until I used it for the first time. The shape makes getting the right angle to file baby’s nail very easy. So simple, yet so effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these "safe" clippers on my newborn that kept scratching her face but when I went to clip her first nail even using the little window it cut her skin. I think it would have been easier to just be careful with regular adult clippers so I could tell better what I was cutting. Haven't used these since. The file is neat looking but doesn't work any better than a regular file.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBradley413

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns, not as good for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: In November our nail clippers broke so I ordered this for my toddler twins. The partial opening wasn’t great for them because they sit on my lap while I cut their nails. I decided to try it on my newborn son and it is perfect for him. I use them when he is on the changing table and from that vantage point they are perfect. I am not hesitant to cut his nails at all! Very durable and will last a long time. I just need to figure out a way to use them with my toddlers too!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: These are a LIFESAVER!! The only baby clippers you should ever buy EVER
customer_reviews.text: I would honestly say that these magical nail clippers are on the top of my “things every mom should own” list. Not only does the window allow you to see what you’re clipping instead of blindly pushing down & praying that you’re not slicing off the top of your baby’s fingertip, but the shape of the blade makes it impossible to accidentally clip the skin. So easy to use, I’m so relieved. Up until now id been gnawing my baby’s nail off with my teeth and his talons have sliced up my chest- never again! Every single one of my pregnant friends will get one of these from me from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: mixbin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the price of these at first, but they truly make the terrifying task of clipping baby’s nails easier. They’re a bit different in that the blades are slanted, but I used them once and got the hang of it. I found that this made it easier to figure out what part of the nail I’m on. I generally clip his nails while I’m nursing, and these clippers make it so much easier to see what I’m doing. I have another brand that I never even took out of the package- these are the ones I reach for every time. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a child user the age of 10, buy these. Hi just had a baby 5 month ago and I got these because I accidentally cut a little of his finger and it was awful for me!! I got on here and found these and am so thankful I did. They are absolutely amazing and so easy to use and I use them on my 2 and a half year old too since he never sits still. I highly recommend them for a new parent or for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Lockard

customer_reviews.title: Best nail care for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this for my daughter. It is extra safe so you don’t accidentally clip their little fingers which is amazing but it extends a little too much for my liking, since I have to hold her hand and fingers and an odd sideways position to wriggle it underneath her nail for it to actually cut. But hey, I’ll take safety first over an ouchie :) For the parents who are terrified of cutting their babies nails...this is for you! Plus the file and ergonomic shape is seriously the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to the unusual shape of the clippers, but the angle at which they cut makes it virtually impossible to cut the baby's nails too close or to cut the skin. the nail file is also a nice shape making it ergonomically correct and comfy to use. I bought one for my baby and my nephew. I recommend it to all my sisters for their babies, try them, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Make your life easier and get this. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Can use when LO is awake or asleep. Cross between scissors and clipper, but silent. Nail file is great addition. I usually do 3 quick snips on each nail--side, middle, side. I just slip the clipper under the nail and snip. I don't have to worry about skin getting under. A little expensive for clippers, but worth it. Wish I got these sooner. I was standing my 6 mo olds nails down every other day w the zolli buzbee.
customer_reviews.author: Caitilou

customer_reviews.title: When I first started using these I did not like them. Then after a few tries I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a very hard time cutting my 2 year old's nails ever since I made him bleed a couple times when he was younger. When I first started using these I did not like them. Then after a few tries I got the hang of them and now really love how they work. I do not know if I would recommend for a newborn, but they work great for a 2 year old. So happy I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dreskin

customer_reviews.title: Won't use another nail clippers again!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I hated cutting my daughter's nails and a friend recommended these. I will not use another nail clipper again. The window let's you see exactly what you are cutting. The way the clippers are shaped makes cutting easier and soundless. My daughter sat through the whole process no problem. Only thing that would make it better would be if there was a little light on it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and eases my mind
customer_reviews.text: I’m terrified when it comes to clipping my baby’s nails. They’re so tiny and hard to see. I love the scissor technique on these (it doesn’t click hard like traditional nail clippers, just softly cuts them like scissors would) so it doesn’t scare her if she isn’t paying attention. The hole is such a smart addition so you can actually see where you are cutting. Great product! I’ve bought almost every product they make, nosefrida, windi, mom washer. Exceptional products and they know just what parents need. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best kids nail clipper I haver EVER used!!!! 100% recommend..... I was a little skeptical alt first buying the product, I was familiar with the brand but I had never used it's products (and I have 3 kids all under the age of 3 [3ys,16months, and 2 months]. Super easy to use and it cuts super smooth, doesn't make the click noise when clipping so it adds a little more comfort to the kids. bye bye Safety1st products
customer_reviews.author: Karen Colin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Buy a more traditional fingernail clipper that has baby size
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed at this nail clipper did not work out. I had always heard great things about the Frida baby products. Because of the way the two blades overlap (instead of connecting at the center like traditional nail clippers) all they did was bend my babies soft flexible fingernails. They did not cut at all. The nail file is a nice feature but what is the point of the nail file if the finger nail clipper doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have made it 16 months without knicking my baby's fingers, knock on wood, thanks to this tool. The viewing window helps to see where the nail is and the cutting mechanism is smooth and easy. The hardest thing about it is keeping him distracted while I do it, but in terms of safe and effective nail cutting, this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: itsiwee

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite nail clipper. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended these to me when I expressed how trimming baby nails was my very least favorite thing ever. Don’t waste your time with the one that lights. It’s too bright and hard to see tiny nails. This one actually has a little hole that allows you to see the nail as you clip. And, it’s super sharp. One quick clip and it cuts exactly what you meant to cut - no bending or breaking of nails.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET CROWLEY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies
customer_reviews.text: When I first looked at them I wasnt sure...and of course, I was a bit scared to clip my baby's nails...I also didnt want her to continue scratching her face. These clippers were Perfect. I was actually able to clip her nails with her completely unbothered in my arms (after nursing of course) and not worry about cutting to short based on the design of the clippers. They are actually quit cool nail clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Noelle

customer_reviews.title: The very best!
customer_reviews.text: The first two weeks of my baby's life I kept her in little mittens because she kept scratching her face. I was so scared to clip her fingernails. I remember many years ago and my sons were babies that I would accidentally clip their skin when I clip their nails. It was my least favorite thing to do and I avoided it at all cost. I wish that these now Clippers that existed then. And I also wish I knew they were so easy so the first two weeks of my daughter's life. These are the best nail clippers ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These nail clippers are so nice to have for a baby. They need their nails cut like 100 times a day. Realistically every 2-3 days. These are the perfect tool. They really are shaped in a way that it's almost impossible to cut the skin. The window is great to see exactly what youre doing and they are so sharp! No struggling to get the nail cut. Feed your baby and get them asleep in your arms. Then use a bright light and snip away!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Not for newborns
customer_reviews.text: The thing is that clippers are way too large to be used on newborns' finger nails and filing off nails so thin is not very effective. So basically for newborns it is useless. Seems to be nicely made, so saving it for later. But if you have a newborn, do yourself a favor and use tips of high quality manicure scissors when baby is in deep sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya L.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: I love frida brand, but I'm not sure if its worth the extra money. They cut like scissors (from one side to the other) instead of straight down like normal nail clippers. They are kind of hard to get used to. However they are really sharp and cut soft baby nails easily instead of bending like some cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love this company!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I cut my LO the first time I tried to trim her nails, and have been afraid to trim them since. Ordered these because she was starting to get old man nails...gross. I chose these because they have the window so that you can see what you are cutting, and upon first use I realized they also cut like scissors which makes them practically silent while cutting. Now I can trim her nails while she's asleep, and she stays asleep long enough for me to trim all 10.
customer_reviews.author: J.Maye

customer_reviews.title: I don't see the hype
customer_reviews.text: So... I thought this would make my life so much easier. Using a regular nail clipper is actually easier for me. I don't see how this is any different and the clippers were clunkier than the ones I already had for adult use. The only thing I liked was the curved nail file but a regular file is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! We were using standard baby nail clippers and it was so easy to get part of the finger clipped with the nail. We absolutely despised clipping our daughter’s nails. We saw the positive reviews on these and figured they were worth a shot. They were SO worth it! They are very easy to use and we never have to worry about getting skin! I would buy these 100x over!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Best nail clipper for a baby/toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and I am stunned at how great this product is. My son always freaks out when I cut his nails (he is 2) and so I cut one of my nails and it was so effortless, and you didn't "feel" it cut. I then tried on my son. He did not get upset at all ... and cutting his nails was so quick and easy. Highly recommend this! My only negative is that I didn't find it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Kern

customer_reviews.title: This company does baby stuff right
customer_reviews.text: I love the window, so you can see what you’re clipping. I also love how the scissor-style blades don’t make a noise, and they cut very easily. I use them on my baby while she’s eating, and she doesn’t even notice what I’m doing. I haven’t used the file yet, but I can’t imagine you can mess up the design of a nail file. This company’s products are wonderful. I also use the snot sucker they make, and that has been a real help too.
customer_reviews.author: thenikkibarber

customer_reviews.title: I was worried at first that the nail clipper was too big but it was so easy to use and I no longer have to worry ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have! I was worried at first that the nail clipper was too big but it was so easy to use and I no longer have to worry about clipping too close to hurt my baby. You can see everything before clipping and I can cut my baby’s nails close enough so he doesn’t scratch himself. The small baby nail clippers are too difficult to use and I could never get close enough because I worried about clipping my little one. Do not hesitate to purchase this product or add it to your baby registry.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: (Nicely trimmed) thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE! The other brand nail clipper keep jamming on me or the screw would pop out in the middle of using it. These are my new favorite baby necessity! I never once clipped my son’s skin on accident, he actually feel asleep while I did his little toes! So easy to use and they feel/look like good quality. I will be gifting this to all my friends and family who are expecting soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ravonnie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Oh. My. God. My baby is almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. God. My baby is almost nine months old and the only thing I can't stand to do with her is cut her nails. It's frightening!! I am so thankful for this clipper because involving her is a whole lot easier when she can see what's going on, which seems to calm the both of us and we get the job done a lot more often. Thank you for this innovative product. I was not looking forward to snipping her skin off, and I haven't yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Delete

customer_reviews.title: clipper and filler are hard to use. filler doesn't stick well.
customer_reviews.text: i get used to the regular clipper and filler that i'm not quite impressed with the curvy design of this set. i tried use it on my baby and the modern design doesn't seem to help but makes my job a bit more awkward. also the filler gets out of the rod and doesn't stick quite well - see picture on what i meant. only thing i'd appreciate is probably the fact that the clipper seems more solid than other brands. But again, since i'm not good at maneuver with the curvy design, I've stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: oohay

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Very safe fo use with baby nails, even newborn nails. I was afraid, with my newborn, to cut nails because I thought I would accidentally cut skin. Or even use a file. But for the last year, I've used this nail clipper exclusively and haven't hurt my baby once. In fact, I bought a second so i can keep in different rooms. this is the only nail clipper I'd use, or buy for others.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I love these clippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these clippers. At first I was super nervous using some other baby nail clippers that I ended up filing my babies nails for the first month and a half but once I tried these I never bothered with the filing again other than smoothing the nails out. I got a 2nd backup pair for my moms and saw that the file was white unlike black from my original pair and the pictures I saw on their site and when I sent a note to Fridababy they responded back right away confirming the color change. Highly recommended, this is a staple item for my LO!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and don't buy any other nail clipper
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and don't buy any other nail clipper or file. It takes a second to figure out how the window works, but just take a minute to practice on your own nail so you get it. It'll be worth it, and you won't ever worry about snipping your baby's fingers anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Nixipixi

customer_reviews.title: Short, quick and awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally drew up the nerve to clip my sons nails and I wish I would've done it sooner. He has a bunch of scratches on his face. :( These clippers are real simple to use. I was able to clip the short and quick! Although I was being careful, I think it's pretty difficult to nip the fingers. And the file is a great shape. Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best baby nail clippers!
customer_reviews.text: We have another set of baby nail clippers and using them made me so anxious about cutting my newborns nails. I ordered this set because of the reviews and it works great! I don’t get nervous about accidentally cutting my baby’s finger. I have recommended them to my pregnant friend. I love all the frida baby products I have used so far!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My baby hates when I cut the nails so I have to sneak up and trim them when the baby is asleep. I tried many baby files and they don’t work, or wake up the baby, this is the only thing that works on my newborn. The clips are designed not to meet, they close slightly off like an overbite (not sure how else to describe it!) this allows you to cut the nails safely without grabbing any skin. Not sure what I would do without them!
customer_reviews.author: Irene K.

customer_reviews.title: Despite the great reviews, I was so nervous to use these ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the great reviews, I was so nervous to use these on my preemie. They seemed too big! We battled with mitts for a while before I finally gave these a try. They are so easy to use, and not too big at all. I was kicking myself for not using them sooner. They work more like scissors than clippers, so you start at one end of the nail and slowly clip your way across. We use these all the time now, and have never accidentally hurt our baby.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The NailFrida has a cool little window that allows you to view baby's nail ...
customer_reviews.text: Three kids later, I've finally found a baby nail clipping solution that works! I've tried other brands of baby nail clippers (too big), files (not effective), and nail scissors (too uneven). The NailFrida has a cool little window that allows you to view baby's nail so you know EXACTLY what you are cutting. They are the perfect size for a tiny newborn up to a preschooler (I'm using them on all my kids now!). I'm able to achieve a quick, effective nail trim with minimal hassle!
customer_reviews.author: mountain mama

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I get this before? It's so quiet that the first time I used it to cut my baby's nails I thought it wasn't working. But low and behold, it cut baby's nails without nicking. The nail filer is also great. A must gift for a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: raven_zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Product is not working
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time , but it didn't work. It seems to be damaged. Then I asked for refund ,I don't know what happened Amazon automatically generated a replacement instead of a refund. So I received another one the next day . The replacement is the same as the first one . This made me fell funny . I don't know if the product designed like this or they both just damaged. Anyway, I don't think anyone can cut their nails with these calipers.I want to speak Loud here. I NEED A REFUND!NOT A REPLACEMENT!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Nail Clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little clippers! I’m using them on my 3rd baby and I wish I would’ve had them for my first two! We previously used the safety 1st clippers that had a little magnifying glass attached but they were still difficult to use without accidentally nicking the baby’s fingers. The window on Baby Frida nail clippers makes it so easy to make sure you don’t clip baby’s finger. I actually really like the scissor style blades too, It made the clippers easier to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you are pregnant or have an infant/toddler these are a must! They are very easy to use and very helpful when clipping my newborns nails, with the little hole you can see exactly what you are doing to make sure not to hurt your little ones fingers
customer_reviews.author: Sar21

customer_reviews.title: Never cut too close
customer_reviews.text: These nail clippers work really well. Clipping baby fingernails is terrifying! I was so scared to cut them the first time but these clippers make me feel comfortable cutting my baby's nails. The little opening allows you to see that you are not cutting too close. They are nice and sharp so the nail never gets stuck. I've used these for two months and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phillygal84

customer_reviews.title: BEST baby nail clipper!
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR the best pair of baby nail clippers I’ve ever used. I love the little window on the top of the clippers that allows you to see how far down on your baby’s nail you’ll be clipping. This feature wonderfully alleviates snipping too far down and traumatizing our poor babies.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Love the file
customer_reviews.text: So..... the time arrived when I needed to do something about my sweet baby's sharp claws. I was getting scratched up, his head, pretty much anyone that held him. I used the clippers to get the long stuff and they are pretty good. They don't close like normal clippers more like scissor motion, my baby baby wiggles too much to really use these. Now this nail file is a godsend. It's curved perfectly to just go around his little fingers. Best nail file for baby I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione Granger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Was apprehensive to use a nail clipper on a baby. Used mine when he was a few weeks old. First when he was sleeping. Now, I do it while nursing. Its design was made so you can't hurt the little one's tiny fingers and cut more than you should. The peephole is a great feature too, so you can see how far your clipping. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stone

customer_reviews.title: Mom of twins - Less frustration, easier clipping!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Love these for my twins! We’ve used plenty of different brands of the traditional baby nail clippers, and even tried the battery powered filers, we found all to be VERY frustrating with 2 wiggly littles. (20 little fingers & 20 little toes!) I ordered these out of desperation and they have been great! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S C Coterie

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.text: First time nervous mom here... ya know, the nervous we all swear we won't be and we snicker at all of the new baby contraptions that there are thinking "we survived" and it's true we did but some things were created to be better and safer and this is one of them. Everyone hates trimming little ones' nails but these are great and remove the fear. I'm not one to write reviews but these are really great and due to the design of them, make it very hard to accidentally clip anything other than the nail. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: The best thing!!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing ever invented! My baby girl moves a lot, and I tried to cute them while she was asleep but the other nail clipper makes a clicky noise and she knew when I was cutting her nails so it was really hard to do it. But this time it was different, the Nailfrida is the best! It cuts ther little nails really fast and without the clicky noise! It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Itati Minaya

customer_reviews.title: Buy these first!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these clippers. First go around I bought cheaper ones but ended up hating them and got these. So I spent more in the long run. Worth the price! I can clip my littles nails without nicking and quietly when he's sleeping. I wish they were larger so I could use them lol.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Simpler and safer
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it I was amazed at how easy it was to use. It can still harm the finger tip if used incorrectly, but only if you press too hard. This is the best nail clipper I’ve used for baby nails so far, and we’ve tried a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Audinac

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got these! I never have to be worried about hurting my child. I never thought I needed a bent nail file but my view has completely changed now. When youre holding a sleeping baby and filing their razor claws down, it is SO HELPFUL to have a bent file!
customer_reviews.author: RockyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Clippers great filer trash
customer_reviews.text: The clippers work perfect... I like the little peep hole for view. Doesn’t make baby bleed if I accidentally snipe him! The nail filer is trash and doesn’t work! BUT the clippers are great which is why it gets 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shiann

customer_reviews.title: Love these nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Love these nail clippers! The worked great because you are able to see exactly what you are cutting. I cut my babies nails when he is awake because they are so easy to use. I don't have to worry about cutting my baby's skin anymore. Great buy. Dish the extra money and buy these clippers!
customer_reviews.author: BellaTrix Nova

customer_reviews.title: Foolproof
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried to purposefully cut my child, but I don’t think these clippers would allow it. The two cutting surfaces don’t meet and pinch the nail, like in a traditional pair of clippers. These clippers have a unique cutting mechanism that make this miserable chore bearable and safer for your kids. These nail clippers are one of my favorite items that we bought for our child.
customer_reviews.author: William Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Best baby clipper
customer_reviews.text: I love everything freida so I’m biased . There I said it ! Best nail clipper ever . Perfect for my newborn baby or on my big kids as well . No accidental boboos by going to deep with the clipper . You can go deeper without hurting them . HArd to explain how until you use the clipper .
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomma

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: If you have a baby or a toddler these are a must! I have used them weekly since the day my daughter was born. Super easy to cut their little nails and without worry. I dont know if I would survive without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for all babies. You think all nail clippers are the same but they aren’t! This one is amazing! It doesn’t let you snip the skin and it has the hole so you can see exactly what you’re cutting! I had purchased first safety ones for my first born, but I wish I would’ve bought these! I know the price difference seems crazy, but trust me it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Yeni

customer_reviews.title: Could not do it with it.
customer_reviews.text: As new parents we were freaked out by thought of cutting our newborn nails. This product came as a recommendation of our friend. We used it with breeze and the little window on the nail clipper let’s you see if you are cutting nails. Round filler is a perfect companion to finish a job. It is a must for the newborn care.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Only used the nail file
customer_reviews.text: I filed my baby's nails in the beginning and then just used regular clippers. I never got the clippers to work right (they are a weird angle) so don't waste your money and just buy a baby nail file (or use a regular one).
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Used the File, Not the Clippers
customer_reviews.text: Clipping baby's nails is terrifying. These clippers make the fear of cutting baby less, but also makes it hard actually cut baby's nails. The nail file I found very useful and I liked the curvy design.
customer_reviews.author: Hey It's Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I would say I don't know what I did before I had these, but I do. I cut my baby's fingers and it was terrible. No more with the nail frida. This nail clipper is so easy to use and does a great job with little risk of cutting your baby. I recommend this to any parent.
customer_reviews.author: Erica E

customer_reviews.title: Great for safety on babies.
customer_reviews.text: Use these on my 5 week old and my 4 yo. They make me feel safe in cutting tiny baby nails after an accident that left me traumatized. The window to visualize the nail is fabulous. I won’t use anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones you want
customer_reviews.text: These are the best nail clippers I’ve ever used. They cut more like a scissor and are very precise. I don’t need the nail file but it’s a nice extra. Would recommend these to all my mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Dalley

customer_reviews.title: NailFrieda is here!
customer_reviews.text: No fear, nailfrieda is here! No longer have to worry about clipping your little ones nails again. The nailfrieda makes it impossible to cut your little one with only one side being a blade with a view finder to visualize even a newborn’s nails.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: The nail file is great but I do wish the plastic around the sides ...
customer_reviews.text: Only clippers we will use. We clip with ease. The nail file is great but I do wish the plastic around the sides was a little thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely HATE cutting my son’s nails. I would sweat like I ran a marathon while cutting them with regular nail clippers because I was so panicked I would cut him. I wish I would have bought these cutters months ago. Being able to see through the hole and the fact that they slice through the nails so easily makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kainan + Novalee’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love file and clipper
customer_reviews.text: The first few months after having my daughter I used a different nail clipper. However from early on the nail file was amazing. Around 4 months old, after a few clipped fingers (worst feeling ever) I tried this clipper. Have not cut a nail since, no clip sound either. Clips the nail more like a scissor and due a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: see rocc read

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: 1. it's too big to be called "for newborns" 2. there is a gap between parts bigger than newborn nail - so this clipper cannot cut soft newborn nail
customer_reviews.author: Anatoli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable, baby doesn't mind it
customer_reviews.text: Only nailclipper I will use on my baby. Easy to see where I'm cutting. Now if only it came with a person to hold her little fingers while I do it, it would be the complete product haha. Love this product, own a couple since I tend to lose them
customer_reviews.author: Yans0809

customer_reviews.title: Best Clippers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I can't say enough good things about these clippers! I was afraid to cut my babies nails until I bought these. Don't use an old school nail clipper and risk cutting your little one's fingers -- ouch! Buy these and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 month old and I’m always super nervous about cutting her nails, but this product definitely makes it easier! I cut her nails every 2 days or else she’ll have scratches all over her face. I can barely see the nail coming in when i cut it, and the clipper didn’t cut her skin. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Size doesn't matter
customer_reviews.text: There are a few reviewers on here that feel these clippers are too big for baby fingers. I wanted to answer this by saying the window is key. They are big, but since you can see what you are doing through the window, these clippers are far better than the smaller ones you can pick up at the grocery store. The criss cross blades also make cutting smooth and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. After some of the mixed reviews I read I was unsure. However, these are awesome. I have tried several other clippers for my baby. Some are too sharp and cut too well and some are too soft. I love the angle of the clipper. I was able to cut my 5 month olds nails so easily. It only cuts right where the clipper is so you don't ever have to worry about grabbing skin.
customer_reviews.author: McManus Momma

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed because it took me longer and required more effort ...
customer_reviews.text: I was reading all the rave reviews and decided to buy it. I was disappointed because it took me longer and required more effort than a regular nail clipper. The only benefit was that it was quiet. However, the nail file was very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Not for babies under 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but I don’t understand view hole. I would not recommend for little ones under 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: April I.

customer_reviews.title: Good as they grow
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! When he was tiny I only used an electric nail file because I didn’t want to hurt him (which worked great!) but as he got a little older and his nails got stronger it was just so tedious. This has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: The peep hole is a little tricky to see but overall these clippers are great! Note, they look weird and I thought they were broke at first, but the top and bottom aren't meant to line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad this product exists!
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are a serious baby must have. They make the process so much easier all the way around. I recommend this product and this brand to all the mom’s I know.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

product_meta.title: NailFrida The SnipperClipper Set by Fridababy – The Baby Essential Nail Care kit for Newborns and up
product_meta.description:
NailFrida the SnipperClipper Set solves all of your trimming trouble.. The SnipperClipper Set includes a uniquely designed nail clipper with a safety spyhole that enables parents to see exactly what you're cutting-no more nicks. It's curved, overlapping blades allow for safe, smooth and silent snipping. The uniquely shaped s-file is perfect for newborn nails.

how to use:

 1. Curved file smoothes jagged nails
 2. Scissor-like, curved blades cut smoothly and easily
 3. Safety spyhole shows what you're clipping



BRAND STORY
FROM DELIVERY TO BOOGERS, BUTTS AND BEYOND! Frida is the brand that gets parents. That means you. We are not a lifestyle. Far from it. We are a solution-based brand. The 411 of parenting. The who-do-I-call-in-the-middle-of-the-night-cause-my-baby-won't-stop-screaming brand.
feature_bullets: NICK-FREE SAFE DESIGN: Patented safety spy hole allows you to see exactly what you're clipping, eliminating the risk of cutting a child's sensitive skin.
CURVED BABY NAIL CLIPPERS with overlapping blades allow for safe, smooth and silent snipping. The baby nail scissor like blades cut nail smoothly with minimal effort.
BABY NAIL FILE is a curved S-shape and is specially designed for small fingers. It follows the contour of baby’s nails for a smooth finish after clipping baby nails.
SAFE FOR ALL AGES from newborns to toddlers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,613 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
